hooks.command: bash -c 'TID="${OPENCLAUDE_THREAD_ID:-0}"; echo "=== LONG-TERM MEMORY ==="; cat memory/MEMORY.md 2>/dev/null || echo "(no long-term memory yet)"; echo; echo "=== TOPIC MEMORY (t$TID) ==="; cat memory/t$TID/MEMORY.md 2>/dev/null || echo "(no topic memory yet)"; echo; echo "=== TODAY TOPIC LOG (t$TID) ==="; cat memory/t$TID/$(date +%Y-%m-%d).md 2>/dev/null || echo "(no entries today yet)"; echo; echo "[Write daily memory to memory/t$TID/]"; echo "[Topic thread ID: $TID]"'
